description: Try our easy to follow Hot Cross Bun Slab Pudding With White Chocolate Custard recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Hot Cross Bun Slab Pudding With White Chocolate Custard
name: Hot Cross Bun Slab Pudding With White Chocolate Custard Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 90 g Cadbury Baking Melts white chocolate

recipeInstructions.text: Serve with a dollop of thickened cream or a scoop of ice cream as desired. Tip: Serve with double thick cream or ice cream
